member.name: TBMETRICS
member.summary: Defines the metrics of a toolbar that are used to shrink or expand toolbar items.

summary.para: Mask that determines the metric to retrieve. It can be any combination of the following:

listheader.description: Retrieve the cxPad and cyPad values.
Retrieve the cxBarPad and cyBarPad values.
Retrieve the cxButtonSpacing and cyButtonSpacing values.

member.name: TBMETRICS.cxPad
member.summary: Width of the padding inside the toolbar buttons, between the content and the edge of the button.

member.name: TBMETRICS.cyPad
member.summary: Height of the padding inside the toolbar buttons, between the content and the edge of the button.

member.name: TBMETRICS.cxBarPad
member.summary: Width of the toolbar. Not used.

member.name: TBMETRICS.cyBarPad
member.summary: Height of the toolbar. Not used.

member.name: TBMETRICS.cxButtonSpacing
member.summary: Width of the space between toolbar buttons.

member.name: TBMETRICS.cyButtonSpacing
member.summary: Height of the space between toolbar buttons.
